Name: Calm Girls
About the game: Introduction to the game: This is a classic puzzle leisure game. There are many types of second-order girls. You can also interact with your sister after you put the pieces together. (you need to download DLC) Game features: 1. Classic puzzles for leisure, Press the F key to make an automatic puzzle. 2. 20 different exquisite quadratic girls, each picture has live 2D animation. (DLC is required to download or static picture) 3. 10 interactive level. (DLC download required) DLC installation method: Press the combination key 'Win + R' to input: steam or steam press the Enter key to download the free DLC to unlock the new interactive animation.
